If Globo continues to acquire more media companies, they could potentially become the only major player in the Brazilian media industry, leading to a monopoly. However, it is important to note that Brazilian regulators have measures in place to prevent monopolies from forming in the media industry. They closely monitor mergers and acquisitions to ensure that they do not harm competition or consumer choice.
